mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.review_content, r.review_date, r.review_like_cnt, u.user_nickName, CASE WHEN rl.review_id IS NULL THEN false ELSE true END as "isLiked" FROM Review as r LEFT JOIN Review_Like as rl ON r.review_id=rl.review_Id AND rl.user_email = #{userEmail}, User as u WHERE book_isbn = #{bookIsbn} and r.user_email = u.user_email ORDER BY r.review_date DESC

SELECT R.*, B.book_title, B.book_img_url, BG.book_grade, CASE WHEN Review_Like.review_id IS NULL THEN false ELSE true END as "isLiked" FROM Review R JOIN LookBookDB.Book AS B ON R.book_isbn = B.book_isbn AND R.user_email = #{userEmail} LEFT JOIN LookBookDB.Book_Grade AS BG ON B.book_isbn = BG.book_isbn LEFT JOIN Review_Like ON R.review_id=Review_Like.review_Id;

SELECT r.review_id, r.review_content, r.review_date, r.review_like_cnt, u.user_nickName, CASE WHEN rl.review_id IS NULL THEN false ELSE true END as "isLiked" FROM Review as r LEFT JOIN Review_Like as rl ON r.review_id=rl.review_Id AND rl.user_email = #{userEmail}, User as u WHERE book_isbn = #{bookIsbn} and r.user_email = u.user_email ORDER BY r.review_like_cnt DESC
